channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Arkansas’ 4 Republican US House members face challenges from Democratic rivals
item.description: Arkansas’ four Republican U.S. House members are trying to fend off challenges from Democrats hoping to break the GOP’s hold on the state’s federal delegation. U.S. Rep.

item.title: Crowds flock to tiny Massachusetts town to send off New York’s Rockefeller Christmas tree
item.description: This year’s Rockefeller Center Christmas tree comes with a strong New England accent, and locals could not be more excited.

item.title: Local sheriff asks FBI to investigate death of Black man found hanging in Alabama
item.description: The FBI is investigating the death of a Black man in Alabama who was found hanging in an abandoned house.
